name: Skeletal System
description: Bones, cartilage, and joints that form the structural framework of the body

name: Muscular System
description: Skeletal muscles that enable movement and maintain posture

name: Nervous System
description: Central and peripheral nervous structures including brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nerves

name: Cardiovascular System
description: Heart, arteries, veins, and capillaries that circulate blood throughout the body

name: Lymphatic System
description: Lymph vessels, nodes, and organs involved in immune function and fluid balance

name: Respiratory System
description: Airways and lungs that facilitate gas exchange

name: Digestive System
description: Organs involved in food processing, nutrient absorption, and waste elimination

name: Urinary System
description: Kidneys, ureters, bladder, and urethra that filter blood and produce urine

name: Reproductive System
description: Organs and structures involved in reproduction and sexual function

name: Endocrine System
description: Hormone-producing glands that regulate metabolism, growth, and homeostasis
